body: Hello, everyone! My name is bob_mac and I have been on the server for over a year. I have only recently found out about these forums and am eager to introduce myself. I prefer passive tactics in order to win games, such as building towers over enemy monuments in order to win battles without a fight. I am also quite interested in suicide tactics to weaken heavily armoured enemies. As you may have already guessed, I am a great fan of Nebula. Currently I am working on a new nether and ice themed nebula map. I believe I have many suggestions and strategies that will help this server. I plan to apply for a staff position.

title: Hello, Everyone!

replies.body:
Hey man! Glad to see you took my advice and signed up to the forums , always great to see a new face. :D

Hope you become another regular to talk to , feel free to hop on Teamspeak if you ever want to chat.
